fixed_skill.desc: Deal Physical damage to 1 foe equal to 82.4/86.5/90.6% of Attack. 12.5/13.1/13.8% chance to inflict Sleep for 2 turns.
fixed_skill.name: Dream Needle

innate_skill.desc: Deal Physical damage to 1 foe equal to 129.1/135.6/142.0% of Attack.
innate_skill.name: Power Slash

innate_skill.desc: Decrease HP cost of skills by 3.2%.
innate_skill.name: Arms Master I

innate_skill.desc: Deal Physical damage to 1 foe equal to 108.3/113.7/119.1%  of Attack. Increase critical rate by 20%, and decrease accuracy by 20%.
innate_skill.name: Lucky Punch

passive_skill.desc: Increase ailment accuracy by 7%. After inflicting a spiritual ailment, decrease target's Defense by 10.5% for 2 turns.
passive_skill.name: Possessed by Madness

passive_skill.desc: Increase ailment accuracy by 7%. After inflicting a spiritual ailment, decrease target's Defense by 12.3% for 2 turns.
passive_skill.name: Possessed by Madness I

showtime_skill.desc: Deal Physical damage to all foes equal to 90.0%/96.3%/102.6% of Attack. Increase damage taken by 19.6%/21.0%/22.3% for 2 turns.
showtime_skill.name: Highlight
